description: Septuaginta LXX ProjectSeptuaginta LXX Project aims to produce an online edition of the Septuagint with a comprehensive critical apparatus, and a new English translation. We seek to collate all extant ancient manuscripts of the Septuagint and make them available at this website.Septuaginta’s Goals:A new critical text of the Septuagint that is as close as possible to the original text.A comprehensive critical apparatus.A new English translation for the Septuagint, Aquila, Symmachus, and Theodotion.A PDF version of the Septuagint that will be made available for download. New VersesGenesis 1:5Genesis 1:4Genesis 1:3Genesis 1:2Genesis 1:1BooksGenesis
